thread.title: Tell Us Which Black Queer TV Characters Mean A Lot To You
thread.title_full: Tell Us Which Black Queer TV Characters Mean A Lot To You

author: Alanna Bennett
title: Tell Us Which Black Queer TV Characters Mean A Lot To You
text:
View this image ›
Netflix ID: 10546452 2. And in honor of Black History Month, let’s take right here and right now as a chance to do just that. We want you to tell us who your favorite black queer characters are, and why they mean something to you. View this image ›
Netflix / Via ohnotheydidnt.livejournal.com ID: 10546463 3. Are you feeling buoyed by William Hill on This Is Us ? View this image ›
NBC ID: 10546532 4. Does Sophia Burset on Orange Is the New Black make your heart sing? View this image ›
Netflix ID: 10546729 5. Does Captain Raymond Holt from Brooklyn Nine-Nine make you want to be your classiest self? View this image ›
Fox ID: 10546687 6. Does Amanita on Sense8 make you want to conquer the world? Do you feel a spark of recognition when you see Denise in Master Of None ? View this image ›
Netflix ID: 10546923 7. Tell us your faves from the past and present and why they matter to you in the comments below — your response may be featured in a future BuzzFeed Community post. View this image ›
HBO ID: 10547067
